biotools.summary: Cell Adhesion Supervised Training and Learning Environment (CASTLE) is a series of ImageJ plugins. CASTLE combines effective techniques for phase-contrast image processing with statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms to interpret the results.

bioschemas.name: CASTLE
bioschemas.summary: Cell Adhesion Supervised Training and Learning Environment (CASTLE) is a series of ImageJ plugins. CASTLE combines effective techniques for phase-contrast image processing with statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms to interpret the results.
